text: Amɨl, sip dɨl, Siliya plopens taun Adiyok ned mɨdɨl owlek ak adɨkɨd amnɨlek. Kɨli ned amnɨg gelek, Adiyok binɨb Jisas nop gos lɨnɨgɨlak okok, God nop agnɨŋɨd agɨlak, Takaw tep nad ak binɨb okok kɨlop agñɨnɨg amebil tek, kɨlopmɨŋal kod mɨdtep gɨnɨmɨn agɨlak. Agɨl, kɨlopmɨŋal agyokel, am takaw anɨb ak mɨdupsek agñɨ ajelɨgɨpil.
